name: The Piper Demo
description:
“The Piper” is a visual novel I made in Unity, using the plug-in Fungus. I wanted make a short narrative based on characters that I’ve been working on developing for about a year now. I decided to do this because that way I’d have a lot of the story ideas in my head already, and character artwork already done. That way I could focus more on learning the software, since I had never used Unity before. Since the story I was able to tell in this game cuts off pretty abruptly, I imagine this would be like a demo for a full length visual novel, if I ever were to make one.
